title: Prepare for public publish & finalize branding (Instant Movie Director)

requirements.summary: Update visible branding to consistently use “Instant Movie Director” (header brand text + browser tab title).
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text no longer shows “Production Studio” and instead shows “Instant Movie Director”.
The HTML document title no longer shows “Prompt-driven Movie Production Team Workspace” and instead shows “Instant Movie Director”.
All user-facing text added/changed for this requirement is in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the header brand text from “Production Studio” to “Instant Movie Director” and ensure any logo alt/accessible text is consistent with the new app name.
Update the HTML document <title> to “Instant Movie Director” so the browser tab title matches the app branding.

requirements.summary: Add an in-app Publish/Deployment help view with readable local and mainnet Internet Computer deployment instructions and expected artifacts/IDs.
acceptanceCriteria: The app UI contains an obvious way to open a “Publish” / “Deployment” help view (e.g., from the footer or header).
The help view includes clear step-by-step instructions for deploying on the Internet Computer, covering both local development deployment and IC mainnet deployment.
The instructions are fully readable without external links (links may be included but are not required to understand the steps).
All user-facing text added/changed for this requirement is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a Publish/Deployment help surface as a dialog (or sheet) that includes fully readable step-by-step instructions for: local dfx deploy and IC mainnet deploy, including exact commands and what to expect (e.g., canister IDs, frontend canister URL, where dfx stores ids). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Dialog, Button, Separator, ScrollArea) to present the content cleanly. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the Publish/Deployment help surface into the UI with an obvious entry point from the footer (e.g., a “Publish / Deployment” button/link) that opens the PublishHelpDialog. Use shadcn-ui Button (and any needed Dialog trigger patterns) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add repository deployment documentation (DEPLOYMENT guide) for prerequisites, build, local deploy, mainnet deploy, and troubleshooting for Instant Movie Director.
acceptanceCriteria: A deployment guide file exists in the repo and includes: prerequisites, local deploy steps, mainnet deploy steps, and basic troubleshooting.
The guide does not instruct using unsupported hosting providers or external databases/services.
The guide references the app name “Instant Movie Director” in user-facing contexts.

file_operations.description: Add a deployment guide for “Instant Movie Director” documenting prerequisites (dfx/Node), build steps, local deploy steps, mainnet deploy steps, expected artifacts/IDs (e.g., canister IDs and where to find them), and common troubleshooting. Keep instructions self-contained and limited to Internet Computer tooling (no external hosting providers or external databases/services).
